TEZ TOUR DMCC Partners

TEZ TOUR DMCC is a global tour operator operates under the same globally registered commercial brand TEZ TOUR and our partners have been selected from different sectors in the travel & tourism field worldwide.

TEZ TOUR DMCC strongly believes that the backbone of any business organization is the strength of the partnership with the existing and potential partners.

TEZ TOUR DMCC selects its partners on the very accurate basis and based on very accurate, sharp and serious parameters for achieving together the planned target which is: The customers’ satisfaction.

Our main partners worldwide,

including Avia Companies and International Hotels’ Chains such as:

Web Community

TEZ TOUR DMCC has its partners worldwide and TEZ TOUR DMCC is doing its level best to grow and to invest in different destinations extending its highest level of service for its customers

TEZ TOUR DMCC Corporate Codex

The main inputs of the corporate codex of TEZ TOUR DMCC is the following:

Customer

Customer

The main target of TEZ TOUR DMCC is the customers' satisfaction and each and every employee's priority is the customer and satisfying the customer's needs and requirements is on our top of list to do.

Enthusiasm and passion

Enthusiasm and passion to our business

We encourage innovation, focus on success, dedication and creativity approach.

We believe the Company, are proud of our brands, products and services.

Decency

Decency

We do strongly believe that the success's key id: The Trust. The mutual trust between the employer, employees and customers is the key of any success from our point of view. We strongly encourage the mutual honestly, trust and respect between all parties.

Professionalism

Professionalism

We highly appreciate the real professionals each in their fields which improves their skills, experiences and abilities for increasing their productivity for the company and for helping the company to reach its main target which is: the customers's satisfaction

The company always welcomes the new ideas which could lead to better results for reaching the perfection. When we make decisions, we do rely on the proper analysis and deep studies for implementing and building the best and most suitable decisions.

Teamwork and collaboration

Teamwork and collaboration without boundaries

Our main strenth point is: The Team. TEZ TOUR Team !!! like-minded people united by the moral and ethical standards, common goals, aspirations, and the pace of development, which is capable of professionally and efficiently to achieve strategic objectives.
